title: ZulfiqarAliTorun
author: ZulfiqarAliTorun
content: Fox is Totally unprofessional bounty manager.  Everyone should refrain from Fox's campaign.  If you can't check the spreadsheet properly, leave bitcointalk.  There is no end to the story when staking. Brainboss, julerz12, Hhumpuz, Bounty Detective Come see how they give stakes, then claim Manager.  The task has been completed for a long time, but the spreadsheet has not yet completed the calculations.  He gave the stake as he wanted.  pankuku, neki, rice, entice, reefer, polkasation have not paid anyone in all bounties.The payment did not update on time even stakes.  Fox can do anything for money, he has done nothing for those who work for him.  Even no one got any result in any of his bounty.  so

comments.author: AirNFT
comments.body: I'm also Agreed, many Bounty Perticipant Complaint that Fox is Like That. I don't know why Fox Like Bounty Managers Provided without escrowd Bounties. Bounty Perticipants really Working hard for Bounties for some money. If Work Completed without payments no one can be happy.

comments.author: AirNFT
comments.body: NEKI Club Bounty &  Enticecoin project Bounty both are Escrowed Project. These project end already 1 month ago. But nobody got paid.

comments.author: AirNFT
comments.created_time: October 12, 2022, 04:37:41 AMLast edit: October 12, 2022, 04:59:41 AM by AirNFT
comments.body: Quote from: AirNFT on October 12, 2022, 04:29:45 AMNEKI Club Bounty &  Enticecoin project Bounty both are Escrowed Project. These project end already 1 month ago. But nobody got paid.https://ibb.co/rcTcKDkhttps://ibb.co/dPJM7KNThose are Rice Protocol Spreadsheets from Fox Campaign.  Look deeper : How they Give stakes Bounty Hunters. Looks like fully Unprofessional.
